original_title: Universal Ike Junior in the Scarecrow and the Chaperone
overview: Miss Charity Prim, principal of a select school for young ladies, decides to take five of her pupils on a vacation. She writes a letter notifying the local hotel keeper that she will arrive by auto. She arrives with her charges and is met at the hotel by a deluge of cowboys, whom she chases away.
title: Universal Ike Junior in the Scarecrow and the Chaperone
